channel.title: Server with Metalscape?
channel.description: I love Metalscape. I can't find any servers with it! Admins, please dont ban or mute anybody who advertises on my post! I would prefer Moparscape.. but a downloadable client will be okay. If you search Metalscape Pvp on this site, you'll find it.

item.title: Server with Metalscape?
item.dc:creator: @thugzook thugzook
item.description:
@thugzook wrote:

I love Metalscape. I can’t find any servers with it! Admins, please dont ban or mute anybody who advertises on my post!
I would prefer Moparscape… but a downloadable client will be okay.
If you search Metalscape Pvp on this site, you’ll find it.

Read full topic
